Climbing Mt. Iwate

2004-09-16


photo by Darby
Click his photo for more from him (good-q), or look at mine (low-q).
I climbed Mt. Iwate most of the way on Saturday, crashed for a few hours in a cabin with 30 of my closest friends, then woke up at 3 to hike the rest of the way up for the sunrise. Laurel said "celestial," I agree.
